> I'm using Eclipse 3.2 using the JUnit 4.1 test runner along with
ANT
> 1.7.0beta1 to do development, and then when I deploy everything is
> executed from ANT 1.7.0beta1 using JUnit 4.1 with the <junit> and
> <junitreport> tasks.
>

> make sure that the necessary properties (arguments) have been
passed

lies

()
